user.title: Configure Dog System
user.description: Set up your comprehensive dog management system for feeding, activities, health monitoring, and daily routines. This system provides intelligent notifications, automatic reminders, and detailed statistics.

data_description.dog_name: A unique name for your dog (letters, numbers, and underscores only)
data_description.push_devices: Select mobile apps or other notification services for reminders
data_description.person_tracking: Advanced features for automatic detection of present persons
data_description.create_dashboard: Automatically creates a beautiful Mushroom dashboard with all features

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.description: Configure advanced features like door sensor integration, health monitoring, and emergency features for a comprehensive dog management system.

data_description.door_sensor: Binary sensor for automatic detection when the dog goes through the door
data_description.reset_time: Time for automatic daily reset of all statistics and counters
data_description.enable_health_monitoring: Enables advanced health monitoring with trends and analysis
data_description.enable_weather_integration: Weather-based recommendations and warnings for walks
data_description.enable_visitor_mode: Special mode for dog sitters, visitors, or vacation care
data_description.enable_emergency_features: Emergency notifications, contacts, and quick access

feeding_schedule.title: Set Up Feeding Schedule
feeding_schedule.description: Set optimal feeding times for {dog_name}. The system can send automatic reminders and track feeding statistics.

data_description.enable_feeding_reminders: Sends automatic push notifications at feeding times
data_description.auto_increment_counters: Automatically increment feeding counters when marked as fed
data_description.strict_feeding_schedule: Shows warnings for late or missed feedings

contacts.title: Contacts and Dog Information
contacts.description: Store important contact information and details about {dog_name} for emergencies and health monitoring.

data_description.emergency_contact_name: Name of the person to contact in emergencies
data_description.emergency_contact_phone: Phone number for emergencies (mobile number preferred)
data_description.vet_name: Name of the treating veterinarian or animal clinic
data_description.vet_phone: Phone number of the veterinary practice
data_description.vet_address: Complete address of the veterinary practice
data_description.backup_contact_name: Name of a backup contact (e.g., neighbor, family member)
data_description.backup_contact_phone: Phone number of the backup contact
data_description.insurance_company: Name of the pet liability or health insurance

error.invalid_dog_name: Invalid dog name. Use only letters, numbers, and underscores. Name must start with a letter.
error.already_configured: A dog system with this name is already configured. Choose a different name.
error.too_many_dogs: Maximum of 10 dogs reached. Please remove an existing dog first.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to one or more notification services. Check your configuration.
error.invalid_sensor: The selected sensor is invalid or unavailable. Choose an available binary sensor.
error.invalid_feeding_times: Invalid feeding times specified. Use HH:MM format.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: A dog system with this name is already configured. You can change settings through options.
